title: Language Selection and Internationalization
description: Verify that the user can select English, Korean, and Japanese languages and that the UI text and SEO content are correctly translated for each language.

steps.description: Navigate to the Web Toolkit homepage.
Select English language.
Verify UI text and SEO metadata appear correctly in English.
Select Korean language.
Verify UI text and SEO metadata appear correctly in Korean.
Select Japanese language.
Verify UI text and SEO metadata appear correctly in Japanese.

title: Tool List Navigation by Category
description: Verify that the user can navigate through the tools grouped by categories: Text & Code, Media & Design, Converters, Security.

steps.description: Open the tools list page.
Verify that categories Text & Code, Media & Design, Converters, and Security are displayed.
Click on each category.
Verify that tools listed under each category correspond to expected tools from the product description.

title: JSON Formatter Tool - Valid JSON Input
description: Verify JSON Formatter tool formats, minifies, and validates syntactically correct JSON data with syntax highlighting.

steps.description: Navigate to JSON Formatter tool.
Input syntactically correct but poorly formatted JSON data.
Click format button or trigger auto-format.
Verify JSON is formatted with proper indentation and syntax highlighting.
Click minify button.
Verify JSON is minified correctly without errors.

title: JSON Formatter Tool - Invalid JSON Input
description: Verify that invalid JSON inputs are detected and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to JSON Formatter tool.
Input syntactically invalid JSON data.
Attempt to format JSON.
Verify that an error message about the invalid JSON syntax is displayed.

title: JWT Decoder Tool - Decode Valid Token
description: Verify that the JWT Decoder correctly decodes Header, Payload, and expiration time from a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to JWT Decoder tool.
Input a valid JWT token string.
Verify that Header, Payload, and expiration fields are correctly decoded and displayed.

title: Image Resizer Tool - Resize and Convert
description: Verify that images can be resized, format converted, and quality adjusted correctly in the browser.

steps.description: Navigate to the Image Resizer tool.
Upload an image file.
Set new dimensions to resize the image.
Select a different image format.
Adjust the quality slider.
Apply the changes and process the image.
Verify the output image has the selected new size, format, and quality.

title: URL State Management and Shareable Links
description: Verify that the tools correctly update the URL with compressed state parameters that can be shared to reproduce the same tool state.

steps.description: Navigate to any tool, e.g., JSON Formatter.
Input some data and apply actions that modify tool state.
Copy the current URL including parameters.
Open a new browser window or private session.
Paste and load the copied URL.
Verify that the tool loads with the exact same input and state as in the original window.

title: Tool Pipeline Functionality
description: Verify that output from one tool can be sent through the Tool Pipeline to another tool correctly.

steps.description: Open the JSON Formatter tool.
Input valid JSON data and format.
Use Tool Pipeline action to send output to JWT Decoder.
Verify that JWT Decoder receives and correctly processes the JSON formatted output if applicable.
Repeat pipeline with incompatible output and verify graceful handling.
Verify appropriate error or empty result handling is shown.

title: Workspace Management - Save and Organize Outputs
description: Verify that users can save tool outputs to the workspace and organize them properly.

steps.description: Use any tool and generate output.
Save the output to a workspace.
Verify that the output appears under the saved workspace.
Open the Workspace manager and organize saved outputs.
Verify outputs can be renamed, deleted, or reordered.

title: Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that the application meets accessibility standards including ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and focus management.

steps.description: Navigate through the application using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys).
Verify all interactive elements have visible focus outlines and proper ARIA attributes.
Verify ToolActionsBar, Command Menu, and all tools are fully operable via keyboard.

title: Theme Toggle - Dark and Light Mode
description: Verify that the theme toggle switches between dark and light modes and persists the selection.

steps.description: Click the Theme Toggle widget to switch to dark mode.
Verify UI changes to dark theme.
Reload the page.
Verify that the dark mode theme is preserved after reload.
Toggle back to light mode and verify.

title: Command Menu Global Search and Navigation
description: Verify that the Command Menu opens with Cmd+K, allows searching for tools and commands, and navigates correctly.

steps.description: Press Cmd+K to open the Command Menu.
Verify the Command Menu appears focused and ready for input.
Type a partial tool name (e.g., 'JSON').
Verify that matching tools and commands are listed dynamically.
Select a tool from the list and press Enter.
Verify navigation to the selected tool's UI.

title: Offline Usage via PWA Caching
description: Verify that cached tools and pages are accessible and functional when offline according to the PWA offline caching strategy.

steps.description: Navigate to several tools to ensure they are cached.
Turn off network connection.
Attempt to open cached tools and use basic functionality.
Verify that tools load and process data client-side without errors.
Attempt to navigate to an uncached page.
Verify that an offline fallback message is displayed or graceful error shown.

title: State Persistence Using Local Storage and IndexedDB
description: Verify state management and persistence using local storage and IndexedDB for recent tools, favorites, and workspace data.

steps.description: Mark some tools as favorites.
Save outputs into workspace.
Close and reopen the browser.
Verify that favorites and workspace data are restored from local storage and IndexedDB.
Clear local storage and IndexedDB.
Verify that recent and favorite tools, and workspace data are reset accordingly.

title: Error Handling - Invalid Image Upload in Image Resizer
description: Verify that invalid image file uploads are handled gracefully with error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Image Resizer tool.
Attempt to upload a non-image file or corrupt image.
Verify that an appropriate error message is displayed and no crash occurs.

title: Security - Client-Side Processing Verification
description: Verify that all data processing is done on the client side and no server data leakage occurs.

steps.description: Use developer tools to monitor network requests while using various tools like JSON Formatter, JWT Decoder, and Image Resizer.
Verify that no unexpected network requests are sent containing input or output data.
Verify that all processing is done purely client-side.

title: Deployment Verification
description: Verify that deployment on Vercel runs cleanly with environment configuration and site build validations.

steps.description: Deploy the Web Toolkit application to Vercel with proper environment variables.
Verify build completes without errors or warnings.
Verify the deployed site loads successfully with all features accessible.

title: Integration and E2E Tests Coverage Verification
description: Run the comprehensive test suite including unit tests (Vitest) and end-to-end tests (Playwright) for critical tools and user flows.

steps.description: Run Vitest unit tests on all core features and tools with coverage reporting.
Verify critical tool functions have adequate test coverage and all tests pass.
Run Playwright E2E tests simulating user interaction flows such as language selection, tool usage, pipeline, workspace and theme toggling.
Verify all E2E tests pass ensuring end-to-end functionality.
